bibl.title: A Survey of Petitions and Related Documents from Ptolemaic Egypt
bibl.note: Revised version of a Ph.D. thesis defended in 2017 at KU Leuven. - Introduction. - Chapter I: ἐντεύξεις: Introduction; - 1. Royal ἐντεύξεις with petitioning function; - 2. Non-royal ἐντεύξεις with petitioning function; - 3. Non-royal ἐντεύξεις without petitioning function. - Chapter II: ὑπομνήματα: Introduction; - 1. Early ὑπομνήματα with petitioning function; - 2. Early ὑπομνήματα without petitioning function; - 3. Later ὑπομνήματα with petitioning function; - 4. Later ὑπομνήματα without petitioning function. - Chapter III: other fragmentary Greek petitions: 1. List; - 2. Form; - 3. Content. - Chapter IV: mḳmḳ: Introduction; - 1. mḳmḳ with petitioning function; - 2. mḳmḳ without petitioning function. - Chapter V: synthesis: 1. Form; - 2. Content. - Chapter VI: capita selecta: 1. The relation between the ὑπόμνημα and the προσάγγελμα; - 2. The personal delivery of ἐντεύξεις, ὑπομνήματα and mḳmḳ to their addressee; - 3. The submission of royal ἐντεύξεις to the strategos and chrematistai. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Sources. - Appendix 1: unpublished ἐντεύξεις and ὑπομνήματα; - Appendix 2: newly published ἐντεύξεις and ὑπομνήματα.
